introduction: Kuan applies disguise on Alien Sparkle and assigns him as the waiter in the noodle shop. But Sparkle keeps messing up and gets complaints from customers, which adds up the fuel in the already unhealthy family life. . Jun and Zhi go to school for the first day. Ahi becomes the teacher's favorite but Jun gets kicked out right after the first class for bad behaviors. Jun asks the innocent Sparkle to help them make fun of the teacher. . The government investigates Sparkle's stolen tomb and finds a lost shoe. Yu lost the shoe at the scene by accident when they were escaping. The local officials make every woman in the town try on the shoe.Can Yu escape from being exposed? . Ling dresses as a man and gets into a fight with the local gangsters. The gang seeks revenge on the family and forces Ling to marry their leader. But Sparkle has developed fondness towards Ling. How will he stop her from marrying someone else? . Ling and Sparkle grow fond of each other. They start dating without letting...
